title: Clinical Psychologist (Freelance, Remote – UK)
shortDescription: Join Nova Clinic's remote network delivering autism and ADHD assessments with the full backing of our clinical operations team.
longDescription: Provide high-quality autism and ADHD assessments for children across the UK while enjoying total control over your schedule. We manage referrals, admin, and reporting so you can stay focused on outcomes.
overviewHighlights: Flexible scheduling — set your remote hours on your own terms.
Clinical, administrative, and technical support handled by Nova.
Transparent compensation with consistent caseloads.
A collaborative clinician community focused on growth and supervision.
Mission-driven culture grounded in integrity, empathy, and innovation.
responsibilities: Lead autism and ADHD assessments for children and young people.
Deliver comprehensive diagnostic reports aligned with NICE / NHS guidance.
Partner with multi-disciplinary professionals when a case needs it.
Translate insights to families with clarity and empathy.
Maintain accurate clinical records within Nova's secure platform.
Continuously improve assessment quality and operating standards.
requirements: HCPC registration as a Practitioner Psychologist (Clinical, Educational, or Counselling).
Proven experience delivering neurodevelopmental assessments (autism and/or ADHD).
Exceptional written communication and diagnostic reporting skills.
Commitment to ethical practice, clinical excellence, and family-centred care.
Confidence working independently while managing a remote caseload.
conclusion: Nova Clinic is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
